text:
/
TO: John Holt, Waldo Abbot, Jack DATE: March 21, 1955
Westbrook, Ed Slack
Hugh M. Mix
FRCM:
SUBJECT: REPORT ON EUROPE
By all means let Purdue continue this series. It has been a good one,
and one which I believe will find wide acceptance on the network.
Unfortunately, I have not been able to find time to audition the latest
batch of tapes sent out by John Holt. But I hope to be able to do so
in the very near future. The flu bug knows no favorites.
Hang on for a while longer, and you'll be hearing from me again in a
few days.
HMM:ln
